title: Cheer - SeasTrend Two 1/18: USPS, Carhart, Daniel Radcliffe, Activision, Neil Gorsuch
itunes:title: Cheer - SeasTrend Two 1/18: USPS, Carhart, Daniel Radcliffe, Activision, Neil Gorsuch
description:
In this edition of Cheer: SeasTrend 2, Jack and Miles discuss the USPS taking orders for free covid tests, Carhart requiring workers to get vaxx'd, Daniel Radcliffe playing Weird Al in "Weird: the Al Yankovic Story", Microsoft acquiring Activision/Blizzard, and Cheif Justice Neil Gorsuch refusing to wear a mask

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
